entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023
